org.db4ospring.support
Class Db4oDaoSupport

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport
      org.db4ospring.support.Db4oDaoSupport
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
public class Db4oDaoSupport
extends org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport

Convenient super class for Db4o data access objects.

Requires a ObjectContainer to be set, providing a Db4oTemplate based on it to subclasses. Can alternatively be initialized directly via a Db4oTemplate.

This class will create its own Db4oTemplate if only a ObjectContainer is passed in.

Since:
07.12.2005
Author:
Daniel Mitterdorfer

Db4oDaoSupport

Method Detail

setObjectContainer

public final void setObjectContainer(ObjectContainer container)
Set the Db4o ObjectContainer to be used by this DAO. Will automatically create a Db4oTemplate for the given ObjectContainer.

See Also:
createDb4oTemplate(com.db4o.ObjectContainer), setDb4oTemplate(org.db4ospring.Db4oTemplate)

createDb4oTemplate

protected Db4oTemplate createDb4oTemplate(ObjectContainer container)
Create a Db4oTemplate for the given ObjectContainer. Only invoked if populating the DAO with a ObjectContainer reference!

Can be overridden in subclasses to provide a Db4oTemplate instance with different configuration, or a custom Db4oTemplate subclass.

Parameters:
container - the Db4o ObjectContainer to create a Db4oTemplate for
Returns:
the new Db4oTemplate instance
See Also:
setObjectContainer(com.db4o.ObjectContainer)

getObjectContainer

public final ObjectContainer getObjectContainer()
Returns:
A valid object container if #setObjectContainer or #setTemplate have been invoked previously. This should ever be the case if you configure this class in your application context file and let Spring wire up the dependencies. If there was no previous call, null is returned.

setDb4oTemplate

public final void setDb4oTemplate(Db4oTemplate template)
Set the Db4oTemplate for this DAO explicitly, as an alternative to specifying an ObjectContainer.

See Also:
setObjectContainer(com.db4o.ObjectContainer)

getDb4oTemplate

public final Db4oTemplate getDb4oTemplate()
